Name: Godfrey
Ingredients: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
7.5 ml Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE blackberries in base if shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: Well balanced with a rich blackberry flavour.
History: Created by Salvatore Calabrese at the Library Bar, Lanesborough Hotel, London, England.
